sections.title: Parisian Enchantment: Romance in the City of Lights
sections.content: Immerse yourselves in the allure of Paris. Begin with a private, bespoke guided tour of iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, ensuring exclusive access and unforgettable photo opportunities. Explore the artistic heart of Montmartre with its charming streets and captivating history. Indulge in a romantic Seine River cruise at sunset, complete with champagne and canapés. Evenings are reserved for savouring exquisite French cuisine at a Michelin-starred restaurant, accompanied by a curated wine pairing and live music.

sections.title: Champagne Bubbles & Provençal Charm
sections.content: Embark on a delightful journey to Reims, the heart of Champagne, for an exclusive champagne tasting experience at a prestigious vineyard. Learn about the art of champagne making and sample exquisite vintages. Next, escape to the sun-drenched landscapes of Provence. Explore the historical Palais des Papes in Avignon and wander through the picturesque hilltop villages of the Luberon region, known for their lavender fields and stunning views. Participate in an immersive Provençal cooking class in Marseille, learning to prepare regional delicacies with fresh, local ingredients, followed by a celebratory lunch featuring your culinary creations.

sections.title: French Riviera: Glamour, Fragrance & Coastal Splendor
sections.content: Arrive in Nice, the jewel of the French Riviera, and take a leisurely stroll along the iconic Promenade des Anglais, soaking in the Mediterranean ambiance. Discover the glitz and glamour of Cannes, known for its film festival, and experience the vibrant atmosphere of St-Tropez, a playground for the rich and famous. Delight your senses with a private perfume-making workshop in Grasse, the world's perfume capital, where you'll create your own unique fragrance under the guidance of a master perfumer.

sections.title: Côte d'Azur Radiance: Luxury & Mediterranean Magic
sections.content: Experience the French Riviera from a new perspective with an exhilarating e-bike tour around Nice, exploring hidden gems and scenic viewpoints. Indulge in a luxurious sunset cruise along the coast, complete with champagne, gourmet appetizers, and breathtaking views. Visit Monaco, the epitome of luxury, and explore its opulent casino and Formula 1 circuit. Conclude your romantic getaway with a farewell dinner at a renowned restaurant overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, savouring the flavors of the region while reminiscing about your unforgettable journey.
